title: Festive salads

description: Episode of Series "Cooking at the Academy". Chef Louie Jocson presents three delicious and nutritional salads and proves that salads do not have to be boring. Step by step instructions are given for each dish. The three salads featured are: tomato and red onion salad with goat's cheese, baby pumpkin salad with smoked bacon vinaigrette and smoked swordfish carpaccio with argula and grissini. These recipes are sure to tickle the tastebuds!
related_objects: Series; S01150; Cooking at the Academy; Active; 1991
